original_text: And I arose in the night, I and some few men with me; neither told I any man what my God had put in my heart to do at Jerusalem: neither was there any beast with me, save the beast that I rode upon.
korean_text: 내 하나님께서 예루살렘을 위해 무엇을 할 것인지 내 마음에 주신 것을 내가 아무에게도 말하지 아니하고 밤에 일어나 몇몇 사람과 함께 나갈새 내가 탄 짐승 외에는 다른 짐승이 없더라

sentences.original_text: And I arose in the night
I and some few men with me
what my God had put in my heart
sentences.korean_translation: 내 하나님이 내 마음에 두신 것을

sentences.original_text: neither was there any beast with me
save the beast that I rode upon
